plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is drama, their favourite kind of plot is complex and multi-layered, their favourite kind of musical score is atmospheric and enhances the mood of the film, their favourite mood for the musical score is sombre and thought-provoking, their favourite setting is urban and contemporary, their favourite visual style is realistic and grounded, their favourite writing style is character-driven and introspective, their favourite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favourite themes are existential, psychological, and socially relevant.
